content:
(Verse 1)
In the stillness of the night, I'm lost in thoughts of you,
Every word unspoken, every dream I never knew.
Caught up in this whirlwind, feelings running wild,
But in the silence of my heart, I'm just a lonely child.

(Pre-Chorus)
Caught between the shadows, and the light that's shining through,
I'm reaching out for answers, hoping they'll lead me to you.

(Chorus)
I'm falling for you, but I don't know where you stand,
Lost in this uncertainty, trying to understand.
Do you feel the same, or am I just a passing phase?
I'm holding onto hope, in this never-ending maze.

(Verse 2)
Every glance you give me, sends shivers down my spine,
But I can't help but wonder, if you'll ever be mine.
Caught in this illusion, of what could never be,
But in my heart, I'm holding onto the possibility.

(Pre-Chorus)
Caught between the shadows, and the light that's shining through,
I'm reaching out for answers, hoping they'll lead me to you.

(Chorus)
I'm falling for you, but I don't know where you stand,
Lost in this uncertainty, trying to understand.
Do you feel the same, or am I just a passing phase?
I'm holding onto hope, in this never-ending maze.

(Bridge)
With every beat of my heart, I'm dancing on the edge,
Between love and longing, where dreams and reality merge.
But in the silence of the night, I'll keep holding on,
To the hope that someday, our love will find its song.

(Chorus)
I'm falling for you, but I don't know where you stand,
Lost in this uncertainty, trying to understand.
Do you feel the same, or am I just a passing phase?
I'm holding onto hope, in this never-ending maze.

(Outro)
So I'll wait for you, in the depths of the unknown,
Hoping that one day, our love will be shown.
But until then, I'll keep believing in our chance,
To find our way together, in this endless romance.
